title: What are some facts of the best bakery case? - Quora

response.answer_text: Bakery cases are a must-have when it comes to keeping the food fresh and give people a visual appeal to purchase a particular product instantly. There are various types of bakery cases available in the market such as glass display bakery cases, bakery cases with LED lighting, etc. A great bakery case is that that keeps perishable items such as bread and cakes fresh for a longer time. Not only is it helpful in keeping such products fresh, but it also helps in uplifting the aesthetic element of the vicinity. Every bakery store must have a bakery case to allure more customers and increase sales.
